introduction: The KLF AKA Bill Drummond and Jimmy Cauty went to the remote scottish island of Jura(the same island they burnt the million pound at) and filmed a 42 minute film , in it they are shown recording sounds from nature like wind , the sea and such ,all this while waiting for their equipment to arrive , when it does they play the sounds they recorded back to the world.This video was only available via mail order and is hard to find .I do have to say that this film will probably will be boring as hell to thoes who are not avid fans of the guys, for them it's a treat...
